languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт смотрит вам прямо в глаза.{/n} "Время, проведенное с тобой, наши разговоры, сияние твоей души, что могу видеть лишь я... Да, веру. С тобой мне..." {n}Она запинается, не в силах подобрать слова.{/n}

{n}Yrliet looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "The time I spent with you, our conversations, the glow of your soul that only I can see... Yes, faith. With you, I..." {n}She stammers, at a loss for words.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт смотрит вам прямо в глаза.{/n} "Время, проведенное с тобой, наши разговоры, сияние твоей души, что могу видеть лишь я... Да, веру. С тобой мне..." {n}Она запинается, не в силах подобрать слова.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "The time I'd spent with you, our conversations, the glow of your soul that only I can see... Yes, trust. With you, I..." {n}She stammers, at a loss for words.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特与你四目相对。{/n}“我和你度过的这些时光，我们的谈话，只有我看到的你的灵魂的光辉……所有这些……是的，信任……我对你……”{n}她有些语无伦次地说道。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "The time I spent with you, our conversations, the glow of your soul that only I can see... Yes, faith. With you, I..." {n}She stammers, at a loss for words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特与你四目相对。{/n}“我和你度过的这些时光，我们的谈话，只有我看到的你的灵魂的光辉……所有这些……是的，信任……我对你……”{n}她有些语无伦次地说道。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet te mira directamente a los ojos.{/n} «El tiempo que he pasado contigo, nuestras conversaciones, el brillo de tu alma que solo yo puedo ver... Sí, es confianza. Contigo, yo...». {n}Balbucea sin saber qué decir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "The time I spent with you, our conversations, the glow of your soul that only I can see... Yes, faith. With you, I..." {n}She stammers, at a loss for words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet te mira directamente a los ojos.{/n} «El tiempo que he pasado contigo, nuestras conversaciones, el brillo de tu alma que solo yo puedo ver... Sí, es confianza. Contigo, yo...». {n}Balbucea sin saber qué decir.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet plante ses yeux dans les vôtres.{/n} « Le temps que j'ai passé à vos côtés, nos conversations, l'éclat de votre âme que je suis la seule à pouvoir percevoir... Oui, c'est bien de la foi. Avec vous, je... » {n}Elle bégaie tandis que les mots semblent lui manquer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "The time I spent with you, our conversations, the glow of your soul that only I can see... Yes, faith. With you, I..." {n}She stammers, at a loss for words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet plante ses yeux dans les vôtres.{/n} « Le temps que j'ai passé à vos côtés, nos conversations, l'éclat de votre âme que je suis la seule à pouvoir percevoir... Oui, c'est bien de la foi. Avec vous, je... » {n}Elle bégaie tandis que les mots semblent lui manquer.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet blickt dir direkt in die Augen.{/n} "Unsere Zeit zusammen, unsere Gespräche, das Leuchten Eurer Seele, das nur ich sehen kann ... Ja, Vertrauen. Mit Euch bin ich ..." {n}Sie stottert, ihr fehlen die Worte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "The time I spent with you, our conversations, the glow of your soul that only I can see... Yes, faith. With you, I..." {n}She stammers, at a loss for words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet blickt dir direkt in die Augen.{/n} "Unsere Zeit zusammen, unsere Gespräche, das Leuchten Eurer Seele, das nur ich sehen kann ... Ja, Vertrauen. Mit Euch bin ich ..." {n}Sie stottert, ihr fehlen die Worte.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットがあなたの目をまっすぐに見る。{/n}「お前と過ごした時間、我らの会話、我にしか見えないお前の魂の輝き…そう、信頼。お前といると、我は…」{n}彼女は言葉を見つけられず、口ごもる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "The time I spent with you, our conversations, the glow of your soul that only I can see... Yes, faith. With you, I..." {n}She stammers, at a loss for words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットがあなたの目をまっすぐに見る。{/n}「お前と過ごした時間、我らの会話、我にしか見えないお前の魂の輝き…そう、信頼。お前といると、我は…」{n}彼女は言葉を見つけられず、口ごもる。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, doğrudan gözlerine bakıyor.{/n} "Seninle geçirdiğim zamanlar, muhabbetlerimiz, ruhunun sadece benim görebildiğim parlayışı... Evet, inanç. Seninleyken..." {n}Ne diyeceğini bilemeden susuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "The time I spent with you, our conversations, the glow of your soul that only I can see... Yes, faith. With you, I..." {n}She stammers, at a loss for words.{/n}
